taxYear.description: The tax year the data applies to. The start year and end year must not span two tax years. No gaps are allowed, for example, 2023-25 is not valid. There is no minimum tax year.

submittedOn.description: The date the ITSA status was submitted, in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

statusReason.description: The reason for the ITSA Status.

businessIncome2YearsPrior.description: The business income for 2 years prior, based on Self Assessment returns or MTD ITSA declarations 2 years before the requested tax year.
